response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, I think it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. Considering its true worth and your potential satisfaction, I am offering you the opportunity to purchase it for $120. This price reflects its exceptional value while ensuring a fair deal for both of us. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and allow you to experience the benefits of our product.", "product_price": 120}
